translations.chinese: 今者有小人言，令將軍與臣有隙。」
translations.english: Now some petty person has spoken, causing the general and me to have a rift."

translations.chinese: 羽曰：「此沛公左司馬曹毋傷言之，不然，籍何以生此？」
translations.english: Xiang Yu said: "This was spoken by Pei Gong's left marshal Cao Wushang. Otherwise, how could I have thought this?"
Xiang Yu then kept Pei Gong to drink.

translations.chinese: 范增數目羽擊沛公，羽不應。
translations.english: Fan Zeng repeatedly signaled Xiang Yu to attack Pei Gong, but Xiang Yu did not respond.
Fan Zeng rose and went out to tell Xiang Zhuang:
